rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var actiontext = \"The solution for this Incident as proposed by SAP SolutionManager has been rejected.\";\u000asystem.vars.$pmc_actions.push(actiontext);\u000a\u000asystem.vars.$pmc_actions.push(\"Rejected solution: \");\u000a// move resolution to activity log and clear resolution\u000asystem.vars.$L_file.resolution = system.functions.denull(system.vars.$L_file.resolution);\u000afor(var i=0; i<system.vars.$L_file.resolution.length(); i++) {\u000a\u0009system.vars.$pmc_actions.push(system.vars.$L_file.resolution[i]);\u000a}\u000asystem.vars.$L_file.resolution = [];\u000a\u000asystem.vars.$L_file.is_ictex_action_blocked = true;\u000a\u000asystem.vars.$exchange_action = \"rejectincidentsolution\";"}
